casebody.data:
McGLADREY & PULLEN
v.
BOARD OF CPA EX. No. 469A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 22, 2005. William L. Rikard, Jr., Kristin R. Poolos, Charlotte, Jack L. Cozort, for McGladrey & Pullen. M. Jackson Nichols, Raleigh, for Board of CPA Examiners.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of December 2005 by Defendant for extension of time to file brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Board of CPA Examiners) shall have up to and including the 27th day of January 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 22nd day of December 2005."
